methodology.description: Tasks selected via stratified sampling across 7 benchmarks, covering all SDLC phases. Each task scored for MCP benefit using weighted combination of context complexity, cross-file dependencies, semantic search potential, and task category affinity.

selection_targets.ccb_tac: 6 (2 excluded: copilot-arena-server repo missing from TAC GitLab)

tasks.selection_rationale: Proportional by repo, prefer most files changed
Proportional by repo, prefer most files changed
